dt: {bc}situated away from the point of attachment or origin or a central point especially of the body {dx}compare {dxt|proximal||}{/dx}

dt.t: the {wi}distal{/wi} ends of the tibia and fibula

dt: {bc}of, relating to, or being the surface of a tooth that is next to the tooth behind it or that is farthest from the middle of the front of the jaw {dx}compare {dxt|mesial||2}{/dx}

shortdef: situated away from the point of attachment or origin or a central point especially of the body

dt: {bc}the convoluted portion of the vertebrate nephron that lies between the loop of Henle and the nonsecretory part of the nephron and that is concerned especially with the concentration of urine
